code: import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from'../constants/urls';import{goToAdminHomePage,goToLoginPage}from'../routes/coordinator';export var sendApplication=function sendApplication(body,tripId,clear){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/trips/").concat(tripId,"/apply"),body).then(function(){alert("Aplicação enviada com sucesso!");clear();}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.response.message);});};export var login=function login(body,history){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/login"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);goToAdminHomePage(history);}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.response.data.message);});};export var logout=function logout(history){localStorage.removeItem("token");goToLoginPage(history);};export var deleteTrip=function deleteTrip(id,getTrips){axios.delete("".concat(BASE_URL,"/trips/").concat(id),{headers:{auth:localStorage.getItem("token")}}).then(function(){alert("Viagem deletada com sucesso!");getTrips();}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.response.data.message);});};export var decideCandidate=function decideCandidate(tripId,candidateId,decision,getTripDetails){var body={approve:decision};axios.put("".concat(BASE_URL,"/trips/").concat(tripId,"/candidates/").concat(candidateId,"/decide"),body,{headers:{auth:localStorage.getItem("token")}}).then(function(){alert("Decisão registrada com sucesso!");getTripDetails();}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.response.data.message);});};export var createTrip=function createTrip(body,clear){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/trips"),body,{headers:{auth:localStorage.getItem("token")}}).then(function(){alert("Viagem adicionada com sucesso!");clear();}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.response.data.message);});};
